title: Perfect Party Arrival Time, On Biden Pond 05.16.22
itunes:title: Perfect Party Arrival Time, On Biden Pond 05.16.22
description:
In episode 1248, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Brian Bahe to discuss… The Baby Formula Shortage is a Real Clusterf--k, America Is Worst Rich Country to Give Birth In Bout To Become Worse, The Perfect Arrival Time for an event and more!

  1. The Baby Formula Shortage is a Real Clusterf--k
  2. What’s Behind America’s Shocking Baby-Formula Shortage?
  3. Whistleblower warned FDA about formula plant months before baby deaths
  4. Why US Parents Are Choosing European Baby Formula
  5. America's Trade and Regulatory Policies Have Contributed to the Baby Formula Shortage
  6. Baby formula marketing ‘pervasive, misleading and aggressive’ – UN report
  7. America Is Worst Rich Country to Give Birth In Bout To Become Worse
  8. The Perfect Arrival Time for an event?

LISTEN: United In Grief by Kendrick Lamar

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
